channel.title: [FM] Poker Mafia 2 - The Elite and The Entertainer won!
channel.description:
<big>[color=gold]:game_die: Welcome[/color]</big> Welcome to poker mafia 2! You can find the rules, class cards and everything related to the game in the following link: https://forum.imperium42.com/t/poker-mafia-2-rules-and-class-cards/65600 <big>[color=gold]:game_die: Rules[/color]</big> **Host:** Psychoneirik **Co-host:** Firekitten
https://forum.imperium42.com/t/forum-of-lies-official-hub/1515
<big>[color=gold]:game_die: General gameplay[/color]</big> Days will be 3 IRL days long or 12 hours after someone is lynched. Nights will be 1 IRL days long Mafia has both day and night chat There are D1 lynches When you receive a card you will have 24 hours to reply, confirming you have received it
### Executions To accuse someone say "**/lynch [player]**" or "**/vote [player]**" Executions will set the day's timer to 12 hours. People can't use day abilities after an execution.
### Journals Message me your entire journal, the last draft I receive before you die shall be the one displayed
### To Join To join, simply express interest in joining by saying something like "I want to join" or "/join" or "/in" or "sign me up, coach" or whatever you want
:game_die: <big>[color=gold] Role distribution[/color] </big>
Townie/neutral roles might be added or removed depending on the number of players.
[color=green]**Townie**[/color] [color=green]**Townie**[/color] [color=green]**Townie**[/color] [color=green]**Townie**[/color] [color=green]**Townie**[/color] [color=green]**Townie**[/color] [color=green]**Townie**[/color] [color=green]**Townie**[/color] [color=green]**Townie**[/color] [color=green]**Townie**[/color]**/**[color=gray]**Neutral**[/color] [color=green]**Townie**[/color]**/**[color=gray]**Neutral**[/color] [color=green]**Townie**[/color]**/**[color=gray]**Neutral**[/color] [color=red]**Godfather**[/color] [color=red]**Mafioso**[/color] [color=red]**Mafioso**[/color] [color=gray]**Neutral Killer**[/color]
Players: 1. <strike>htm</strike>**[color=green]Townie[/color], Died N4** 2. <Strike>Memesky</strike> **[color=green]Townie[/color], lynched D2** 3. <Strike>Celeste_Ludenberg </strike> **[color=green]Townie[/color], killed D1 by an exploding present** 4. <strike>PoisonedSquid</strike>**[color=green]Townie[/color], Died N3** 5. <strike>MtheJoker</strike> **[color=gray]Entertainer[/color], Died N4** 6. <strike>NuclearBurrito</strike>**[color=green]Townie[/color], Died N3** 7. <strike>CaptainNerbins</strike> **[color=red]Mafioso[/color], Died N4** 8. MaximusPrime 9. <strike>Marluxion</strike> **[color=red]Mafioso[/color], Died N1** 10. <strike>Sam17z</strike> **[color=red]Godfather[/color], Died N4** 11. Livicus 12. <strike>Pug</strike> **[color=green]Townie[/color], Lynched D4** 13. <strike>Ukantor</strike>**[color=green]Townie[/color], Died N1** 14. ConfustoLook 15. Hippolytus (Replacing Cassar)**[color=green]Townie[/color], Died N2** 16. <Strike>PokemonKidRyan</strike> **[color=green]Townie[/color], killed D1 by an exploding present**
Spectators: 1. Twil1ght
:game_die: <big>[color=gold] Notable events[/color] </big> * [Start of Day 1](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fm-poker-mafia-2-day-1-16-16-let-the-gambling-begin/66245/290?u=psychoneirik) * [PKR died to an exploding present!](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fm-poker-mafia-2-day-1-16-16-let-the-gambling-begin/66245/498) * [Celeste exploded too!](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fm-poker-mafia-2-day-1-14-16-everyone-goes-boom/66245/520) * [D1 ability pool and highest bids](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fm-poker-mafia-2-day-2-12-16-a-meme-is-born/66245/691) * [Hippolytus died before he even got to play. He was a townie. Press F to pay respects](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fm-poker-mafia-2-day-2-12-16-a-meme-is-born/66245/704) * [Marl was found dead, he was a Mafioso](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fm-poker-mafia-2-day-2-12-16-a-meme-is-born/66245/705) * [D2 has started! Ability pool, event and roulette](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fm-poker-mafia-2-day-2-12-16-a-meme-is-born/66245/706)
:game_die: <big>[color=gold] Today's ability pool[/color] </big> | | | | |---|---|---| |:first_quarter_moon_with_face: = Night ability | |:sun_with_face: = Day ability| |:shield: = Passive ability| |:star: = Golden ability| |:hearts: = Support ability | |:wine_glass: = Offensive ability| |:imp: = Scum ability| |:skull_and_crossbones: = Killer ability| |:speech_balloon: = Social ability | |:mag:: = Investigative ability| |:game_die: = Gambling ability| || 1. :first_quarter_moon_with_face: Check the faction of a player. 1 use. 2. :first_quarter_moon_with_face: Check if two players have the same faction. 3 uses. 3. :first_quarter_moon_with_face: :star: Heal up to 3 players from attacks, poison or bleeding. 1 use.
:game_die: <big>[color=gold] Today's event[/color] </big>
**Pawn shop:** Double any tokens you get from selling back an ability.
:game_die: <big>[color=gold] Today's roulette[/color] </big>
Roulette will end in 24 hours, you won't be able to buy tickets after that.
**Available Tickets:** Each ticket costs 1 token. > **Gambling ticket:** This ticket allows you to place a bet on the roulette. You can bet for both a color and a number. Depending on which you get right you will get a prize. > * Guessing the color correctly gives you 2 tokens for each ticket. > * Guessing the number correctly gives you 3 tokens for each ticket. > * Guessing both the color and the number correctly gives you 6 tokens for each ticket. > > **You can buy as many gambling tickets as you want, but you may only place one bet.** >
> **Golden ticket: When the roulette ends, a random ticket will be chosen as the winner. The winner will get a random Golden ability!** > >**You can buy as many Golden tickets as you want, but there will only be one winner.**
